 form_builder_ktp = {
    'typeCard': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required])],
    'birthplace': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],
    'address': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],
    'country': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],
    'fullname': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
    'companyname': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
    'birthdate': [null],            
    'city': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
    'nation': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],        
    'email': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.email])],            
    'phone': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
    'postcode': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
    'marcode': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
    'corresponden': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
    'ktp1': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
    'npwp1': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
    'kitas': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
    'passport': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
            
}

form_builder_tdd = {
  'typeCard': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required])],
  'address': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],
  'ktp2': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],       
  'npwp2': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
  'email2': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.email])],
  'postcode': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
  'city': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
  'companyname': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
  'country2': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
  'established': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            
  'corresponden': [null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(50)])],            


}
